house_rules: Unlike most other Airbnb listings, what we do here is long-term rentals by the year, or by the semester and we can welcome compatible short-term guests. Only for one person (no couples, no visitors). We seldom have visitors, let alone overnight guests. We know this will be a major turn-off to many people, but we believe we can find a like-minded roommate who can have fun outside the house.   4. If you re not sure about your check-out date, you can reserve the minimum days and extend your stay at a discounted rate.   5.
